prompt_base: raw photo, cinematic film still, portrait of a (muscular bald martial artist:1.2), (three functional realistic eyes on forehead:1.4), intense determined expression, 8k uhd
feature_prompt: defined muscular physique, sharp focus on the third eye structure, detailed realistic fabric weave on gi, slight skin imperfections, realistic proportions, source palette preservation, identical color matching
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, plastic, smooth skin, perfect face, (two eyes only:1.5), missing eye, blurry eyes, helmet hair, low quality, doll, sfw, (forehead tattoo:1.2)
